TopicTitle: Can't click on any of the KSC buildings to enter, cant click "Quit to Menu"

Articles.Content:
So when I launch the game, everything loads correctly from what I see. However , when I enter a saved world or start a new one, I can't enter any of the buildings by clicking on them, and when I press escape I can enter settings, save games and load them, but cannot return to menu. I tried clearing all input locks but that doesn't help.

Here are my logs:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/gmnskpfcib6s0b8/Player.log?dl=0

So when I launch the game, everything loads correctly from what I see. However , when I enter a saved world or start a new one, I can't enter any of the buildings by clicking on them, and when I press escape I can enter settings, save games and load them, but cannot return to menu. I tried clearing all input locks but that doesn't help.

Same issue here, also can't even launch any crafts - once i click the button it just closes the menu and that's all that happens. Super weird

So when I launch the game, everything loads correctly from what I see. However , when I enter a saved world or start a new one, I can't enter any of the buildings by clicking on them, and when I press escape I can enter settings, save games and load them, but cannot return to menu. I'm having the same problem with my game as well.

@JEB'S DESTINY Your log shows quiet a few exceptions thrown by FAR. Not sure how this will prevent you from entering any buildings but a faulty mod can cause weird issues sometimes. I would suggest to remove FAR for testing purposes and see if it solves your issue. If it does, report it to the mod creator/maintainer

Would be interesting to see if the other people with the same issue here also installed FAR but without a log, I'm not going to bother looking for similarities
